description.english: Smash the ground with your axes for the first time
description.german: Triff mit deinen Äxten zum ersten Mal den Boden.
description.french: Déclenche ta première attaque vers le bas
description.italian: Colpisci il suolo con le tue asce per la prima volta
description.spanish: Golpea el suelo con el hacha por primera vez
description.polish: Huknij w ziemię po raz pierwszy

description.english: Collect all the SeY bottles in one level
description.german: Sammele alle SeY-Flaschen eines Levels.
description.french: Ramasse toutes les bouteilles de SeY d'un niveau
description.italian: Colleziona tutte le bottiglie di SeY in un livello
description.spanish: Recoge todas las botellas SeY de un nivel
description.polish: Zbierz wszystkie butle z SeY na jednym poziomie

description.english: Slice all the enemies in one level
description.german: Erledige alle Gegner eines Levels.
description.french: Tue tous les ennemis d'un niveau
description.italian: Elimina tutti i nemici in un livello
description.spanish: Derrota a todos los enemigos de un nivel
description.polish: Rozpłataj wszystkich przeciwników na jednym poziomie

description.english: Beat our time in one level
description.german: Schlage unsere Zeit in einem Level.
description.french: Bats notre temps sur un niveau
description.italian: Batti il nostro tempo in un livello
description.spanish: Supera nuestro tiempo de un nivel
description.polish: Popraw nasz czas na jednym poziomie

description.english: Beat our time in each level
description.german: Schlage unsere Zeit in jedem Level.
description.french: Bats tous nos temps
description.italian: Batti il nostro tempo in ciascun livello
description.spanish: Supera nuestro tiempo en cada nivel
description.polish: Popraw nasz czas na każdym poziomie

description.english: Collect all the SeY bottles in each level
description.german: Sammele jede SeY-Flasche in jedem Level.
description.french: Ramasse toutes les bouteilles de SeY de tous les niveaux
description.italian: Colleziona tutte le bottiglie di SeY in ciascun livello
description.spanish: Recoge todas las botellas SeY de cada nivel
description.polish: Zbierz wszystkie butle z SeY na każdym poziomie

description.english: Collect more than 4 000 SeY bottles
description.german: Sammele mehr als 4 000 SeY-Flaschen.
description.french: Ramasse plus de 4 000 bouteilles de SeY
description.italian: Colleziona più di 4000 bottiglie di SeY
description.spanish: Recoge más de 4.000 botellas SeY
description.polish: Zbierz więcej niż 4 000 butli z SeY

description.english: Slice all the enemies in each level
description.german: Erledige alle Gegner in jedem Level.
description.french: Tue tous les ennemis de tous les niveaux
description.italian: Elimina tutti i nemici in ciascun livello
description.spanish: Derrota a todos los enemigos de cada nivel
description.polish: Rozpłataj wszystkich przeciwników na każdym poziomie

description.english: Slice more than 999 enemies
description.german: Erledige über 999 Gegner.
description.french: Tue plus de 999 ennemis
description.italian: Elimina più di 999 nemici
description.spanish: Derrota a más de 999 enemigos
description.polish: Rozpłataj więcej niż 999 przeciwników

description.english: Die more than 15 times in one level
description.german: Stirb mehr als 15 Mal in einem Level.
description.french: Meurs plus de 15 fois dans le même niveau
description.italian: Muori più di 15 volte in un livello
description.spanish: Muere más de 15 veces en un nivel
description.polish: Zgiń więcej niż 15 razy na jednym poziomie

description.english: Escape the cage
description.german: Entkomme dem Käfig.
description.french: Echappe-toi de la cage
description.italian: Evadi dalla gabbia
description.spanish: Escápate de la jaula
description.polish: Wydobądź się z klatki

description.english: Finish the underwater level without dying
description.german: Schließe den Unterwasserlevel ab, ohne zu sterben.
description.french: Finis le niveau sous l'eau sans mourir une seule fois
description.italian: Completa il livello sott'acqua senza morire
description.spanish: Termina el nivel acuático sin morir
description.polish: Ukończ poziom podwodny bez ani jednej śmierci

description.english: Defeat the final boss with bombs only
description.german: Besiege den Endgegner nur mit Bomben.
description.french: Bats le boss final uniquement avec des bombes
description.italian: Sconfiggi il boss finale usando solo le bombe
description.spanish: Derrota al jefe final solo con bombas
description.polish: Pokonaj ostatniego bossa przy pomocy samych bomb

description.english: Destroy the boss' ship without touching the ground
description.german: Vernichte das Endgegnerboot, ohne den Boden zu berühren.
description.french: Détruis le vaisseau du boss final sans toucher le sol
description.italian: Distruggi la nave del boss senza toccare il suolo
description.spanish: Destruye el barco del jefe sin tocar el suelo
description.polish: Zniszcz statek bossa bez dotykania ziemi

description.english: Destroy the boss' ship from underneath
description.german: Vernichte das Endgegnerboot von unten.
description.french: Détruis le vaisseau du boss final par dessous, avec le grappin
description.italian: Distruggi la nave del boss da sotto
description.spanish: Destruye el barco del jefe desde abajo
description.polish: Zniszcz statek bossa od dołu

description.english: Finish the boss's whining head
description.german: Erledige den jammernden Kopf des Endgegners.
description.french: Achève la tête chouineuse du boss final
description.italian: Dai il colpo di grazia alla testa frignante del boss
description.spanish: Remata la cabeza llorica del jefe
description.polish: Ucisz jęczącą głowę bossa

description.english: Collect enough SeY to save the village
description.german: Sammele genug SeY, um das Dorf zu retten.
description.french: Ramasse assez de SeY pour sauver le village
description.italian: Colleziona abbastanza SeY per salvare il villaggio
description.spanish: Recoge suficientes SeY para salvar la ciudad
description.polish: Zbierz wystarczającą ilość SeY, by uratować wioskę

description.english: Earn your first gold medal
description.german: Gewinne deine erste Goldmedaille.
description.french: Gagne ta première médaille d'or
description.italian: Conquista la tua prima medaglia d'oro
description.spanish: Gana tu primera medalla de oro
description.polish: Zdobądź swój pierwszy złoty medal

description.english: Collect all bronze medals
description.german: Gewinne alle Bronzemedaillen.
description.french: Gagne toutes les médailles de bronze
description.italian: Colleziona tutte le medaglie di bronzo
description.spanish: Recoge todas las medallas de bronce
description.polish: Zbierz wszystkie brązowe medale

description.english: Collect all silver medals
description.german: Gewinne alle Silbermedaillen.
description.french: Gagne toutes les médailles d'argent
description.italian: Colleziona tutte le medaglie d'argento
description.spanish: Recoge todas las medallas de plata
description.polish: Zbierz wszystkie srebrne medale

description.english: Collect all gold medals
description.german: Gewinne alle Goldmedaillen.
description.french: Gagne toutes les médailles d'or
description.italian: Colleziona tutte le medaglie d'oro
description.spanish: Recoge todas las medallas de oro
description.polish: Zbierz wszystkie złote medale
